name: Kill or be Killed (Doubt)
description:
BigRedEyesProductions ( 🔴___🔴 )

In this game we mix together shooting, jumping, flying and speed!

After winning my first Unity Challenge - My First Microgame Challenge, I want to continue to build this out and make it the best first game it can be. 

Please feel free to leave feedback.

Latest updates: https://connect.unity.com/p/fps1-ob1m
